article_title: Jury Begins Deliberating Insider Trading Case of SAC Portfolio Manager Michael Steinberg
article_text:
Jurors began deliberating Tuesday on the fate of a senior SAC Capital Advisors LP portfolio manager accused of using inside information to trade on technology stocks.

Deliberations in the trial of Michael Steinberg began Tuesday morning in federal court in Manhattan after a nearly four-week trial that featured 13 witnesses and provided previously unknown details about the hedge fund giant's inner-workings.

Mr. Steinberg, 41...
